DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study understand effect muscle strengthen balance exercise intervention muscle strength , run mechanic postural control novice recreational runner . Participants assessed engage 8-week exercise intervention program .
DOC.brief_title: Exercise Interventions , Running Biomechanics Injury Novice Runners
DOC.criteria: Novice recreational runner Less one year run experience Run least twice week total weekly distance 5 15 km main form physical activity 1850 year age Neurological abnormality low extremity injury pain within three month enrollment . No extensive history balance training isolated ankle strengthen within last year .
